Faster and Easier Appointment Schedule and Workflow Management

By IXN Team 19

Abstract

Moorfields Eye Hospital uses excel spreadsheets to record patients'information and update their Appointment Schedules. It is not particularly efficient - ocularists and admins have to navigate and modify across several different spreadsheets in order to perform simple actions such as book in appointment. It also shows a lot of information in one spreadsheet at once which is hard for ocularists to locate the data they need. Our website is here to save them from the time consuming and chaotic scheduling processes. We provide intuitive user interface that shows informations in a clear way,and a significantly faster and easier booking process.

Demo Video

Personal Timetable

The personal rota page shows the user's timetable for today as default. It has a date picker which allows user to view their appointment in other particular dates. The appointments in timetable are clickable and expanding windows will show up providing extra informations about the appoinments and its patients. This save time for ocularists so that they do not need to find patients' details in another page.

Appointment Scheduling

We have a simple appointment booking process. On our appointment page, we shows all the appoinments we currently have as a list. Ocularists and admins can find the appoinments they need to modify by search {name?}. To add new appoinments or modify the exising appoinments, all they need to do is to fill out one form and the system will do the rest of jobs. All changes will be automatically added to the database and shows at corresponding ocularists'personal timetable. This makes booking processes for both admins and ocularists significantly shorter and easier comparing to the exising processes where they have to navigate change data in several files.

Waiting List

Our waitlist page allow admins and ocularists to review all patients in waitlist. patients can be filtered according to their priority and if they are adults or children. It also allow admins to delete, add patients and change patients details.

User Authentication

Our user authetication function detects types of users and gives each type different acesses to system and operations. For example , an admin can have right to reschedule an appointment while ocularists can not. It also detects logged in users so that we shows users personal information correctly.
